events.blurb: Molly and Arthur caught by Apollyon Pringle
events.description:
Sometime in the range 1963 to 1967, Molly and Arthur
are caught out after curfew by then caretaker Apollyon
Pringle.  Arthur still has marks from the encounter,
strongly suggesting that corporal punishment is still
used at that time.
events.source:
Mrs. J. K. Rowling. 
_[Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire]_
Pottermore Limited. American Kindle Edition.
Approx Kindle Location 9208 of 11332.

[Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire]: https://www.librarything.com/work/113

events.description:
At an unknown point in the 1960s, but based on inference
from other dates probably 1965, Lucius Malfoy starts his
first year at Hogwarts.

events.blurb: Squib Rights Marches during hte late 1960s.
events.description:
At an unknown point during the Late 1960s, probably either
1968 or 1969, there were Squib Rights Marches.  These
were interuptped by pure-blood counter protesters who
rioted.
events.source:
Mrs. J. K. Rowling.
"[Ministers for Magic](https://www.rowlingindex.org/work/msmpm/)"
[The J.K. Rowling Index](https://www.rowlingindex.org/) Originally Published on
Pottermore 2014-10-31. Last Visited 2023-12-04.
